title: A bug with zeddy's q (or w)
body: Check this out: When zed use his w, after the shadow disappear, when you try to use q it shows you 2 Q's range there, and the one will not be shown but after u use your q it shows. is that a bug;(

replies.body: I despise you, I'm pretty sure every zed knows that u need smart cast, you are probs one of those free role zed players however think ur good with a skin
WTF are you on about? just playing with friends and it is a bug, i always do smart cast so shush when u cant help this hell no
